website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, traditional-style box that holds an impressive number of tools or parts but may have durability issues.
pros: Top section holds multiple small items
cons: Some issues with drawers sliding out and handle failure
Lighter gauge material seems somewhat flimsy

website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, traditional-style box that holds an impressive number of tools/parts but may have durability issues.
pros: Top section holds multiple small items
cons: Some issues with drawers sliding out and handle failure
Lighter gauge material seems somewhat flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Portable size and perfect for DYIrs.
customer_reviews.text: This has the perfect size and feel for the money. I do car repairs at home occasionally and carry metric tools only (not enough space for both). The top compart is surprisingly tall and could take some extra tools if set properly. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Villa

customer_reviews.title: Indicated weight is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This tool box seems to be well constructed and holds everything that I need. However, it does not weigh 5.3 pounds as shown in the Amazon information but rather close to 16 pounds (according to my bathroom scale). I'm going to keep it anyway but agree with the reviewer who suggested getting a carrier strap and the handle is under a lot of stress once the box is fully loaded.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneEliz

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Semi-Set Toolbox
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe I could be happier with this product (even with my one wishlist item granted / unlockable drawers when closed). It is solid, with top performing slider drawers that are pleasing depth, etc. This box, although having a top handle, is borderline too heavy when filled to be portable for most. For our application it doesn't need to move much. It is destined to be a Semi-Set top chest on a column of standard and hobby tools... and I do like its portability. Unless it gets run over, we will get decades of service from it.
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: good enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: The latch can miss the drawers if you don't hold them in when closing the top. But, as long as your careful, the drawers latch well. I don't plan to move mine very often so the look is good. Space is good. Comes with foam bottoms on all drawers and the amount of storage was just what I expected. For the price, it is a good looking capable box. works for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Quality box
customer_reviews.text: The box is solid and well made. The quality is superb! The ball bearing drawers are smooth, and fully extend for easier access. Each drawer came with a liner that protects the box from getting beat up. I am using it to store my plumbing tools. It also came with an Owners Manual so you can register the product, and order spare parts for the box if needed! By the way, Homak has been around since 1947! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry box size
customer_reviews.text: The listed dimensions of the Homak Tool Box are a bit deceptive, as they're external measurements of the box itself. The usable space inside the drawers are 17.5" x 7.5" by 1.5". Seven and a half inches front to back isn't going to offer space for many tools unless you lay them length-wise, so forget about lining them up across the drawer left to right. Nonetheless, it is a decently made box, and I appreciate the ball bearing drawers. I've decided to use this box for odds and ends of screws, plugs, and various mechanical parts. I have a bigger Craftsman chest for tools, though it's not as well made as the Homak.
customer_reviews.author: thorogood

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: A good box; in retrospect I would have likely bought the Gearwrench offering. While I like homak in general, this is not their best unit. This box locks the drawers when the lid is down, rather than having a keyed lock (you can secure it with a padlock when the lid is down. I have not had problems with the plastic handle, but I am keeping an eye on it. Good, not great design. Sturdily manufacured enough. 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Broke after opening 3 times. DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. I’ve opened it maybe 3 times and the top shelf has come untacked on the left side. This really is upsetting because it spent this money on a tool box that wasn’t that cheap to begin with. I hope I have better luck next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mady

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the item very quickly from the supplier. That was a plus. BUT while the box is well made, it has one large flaw. The bottom is warped. If I sit it on a flat, solid surface, it wobbles...... badly. It is not flat on the bottom. One big item that I liked, is the fact that it comes with lining on the bottom of the inside, top shelf and all the drawer bottoms.......NICE touch! If the bottom was flat, I'd easily give it 5-Stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well built tool box
customer_reviews.text: Solid built tool box, arrived in excellent condition. This box is well built, like Craftsman toolboxes were 25 years ago. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received this tool box today, in the Product Information- " Technical Details" is says Product Dimensions 22.5 x 12 x 10.4 inches the box is actually 20"x 10"x 8 1/2 , good thing i bought a bigger kobalt at Lowes for $20 less a few days ago, even the Homack professional tag is different then the picture, handle feels cheap with a few pop rivets holding it down, should be selling for half the price it is now IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold a lot of tools but for a small tool kit, it works well. The drawers are sturdy and it's light weight enough I can take it to the projects I need to work on.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tadlock

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Like a few other reviews said, the quality of this toolbox is pretty poor. The metal is thin enough to see the welds on the opposite side through the finish. Furthermore, mine came with a giant dent/buckle in the lid... I'd make a damaged product claim with amazon and I know they'd replace it, but it's just not worth the hassle. Everything seems functional, but I can't say I'm not a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: I was confined in size, so this chest seemed to fit the bill. I thought the ratings were substantial and made my order. The chest is as described, but I was disappointed on it's constructive material. The sheet metal is flimsy with the drawers sliding on "ball bearing" rollers, but it seems like they skimped on the number of bearings as each time you open any drawer, they bind making you open the drawer somewhat gently . Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Newman

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed when receiving this toobox especially after reading all the reviews. My opinion is it lacks quality. The metal is very thin, the hinges and latches are not aligned properly, even the Homak rectangular plate is not on straight. I'm not sure how long this will last and I'm not sure if I'm going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Great for your tools!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to organize some tools in my garage. It fits a decent amount and looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: MarcusJinPGH412

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool box!
customer_reviews.text: Here is a quick review of Red Homak 3-Drawer Tool box: Nice design and function of the drawers. Drawers come with a nice black liner. Smooth drawer rollers for a smooth action. Top drawer depth is 2 3/8" (for hammers, drills, etc...) 3-Sliding drawers are aprox 1 3/4" deep. This tool box is not designed (in my opinion) to be carried around every day. The handle and latches would not take the abuse. I deducted 1 star for this. This is a great shop or home tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W Reid

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be a sturdy toolbox. The drawers slide easily
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a sturdy toolbox. The drawers slide easily, hasps close nicely, and there is plenty of room for the tools I use. Well constructed and handle carries box nicely. I am very pleased with the purchase.....Thanks, Rick Burnham
customer_reviews.author: Rick Burnham

customer_reviews.title: very cheap
customer_reviews.text: i was putting on tool in my new tool bow and the bottom draw wont hold my tool. very cheap
customer_reviews.author: george hale

customer_reviews.title: I used it as a stationary set of drawers
customer_reviews.text: I removed the safety pin so I could open the drawers without opening the lid. This allow me to add it to my collection without having to buy an expensive set of drawers for my tools and junking my current set.
customer_reviews.author: Mr B

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid tool box for the road
customer_reviews.text: I've got a couple other tool boxes that are not quite as solid- or as expensive. I thought they would work fine, and they pretty much did, but opted to get a better one for my main repair tools and I'm happy I did. The others are now for specialized tools. The box is not huge, but a good size to carry. I do wish it were slightly deeper, but I knew what I was getting. All in all, very happy with it and no problems with it in a year or so of somewhat heavy usage. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I thought this box would be perfect for my workbench area. I don't transport tools often, so this box just sits on my workbench and helps keep most of my everyday tools in one place. So far, I think it's the best you can get for the money. Ball bearing drawers are a must. I also drilled two holes in the top to screw in a magnetic bar to hold other bits and things. The only thing I don't like about it (but not a deal breaker) is the paint finish on the box is gloss black which leaves finger prints and shows dust easily.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Can't exactly get crazy excited about a toolbox but this is good although a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: lensop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer that’s well made!
customer_reviews.text: A well made product with smooth drawers. This is nice for my drill and bits, screw drivers, wrenches, and various tapes.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin G. Calissi

customer_reviews.title: Great toolbox and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The toolbox is well made and the exact size as specified.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and is the product I needed. Perfect size for the amount of tools I have and room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Scoles

customer_reviews.title: Nice toolbox!
customer_reviews.text: The paint is good. The drawers are good & smooth - but not super high end like a lot of the large rolling tool chests. The top doesn't flex even though my toolbox weighs probably 40 something pounds. The drawers don't slide out when its tipped with the top closed. The buckles stay clasped, and there's the option for a lock.
customer_reviews.author: FillyCheezStake

customer_reviews.title: Great Toolchest
customer_reviews.text: This tool chest has served me faithfully for over 2 years. The drawers are on ball-bearings and they still open smoothly to this day. I have heavier hand tools on the bottom drawer and the lighter tools on the top drawer. Its built like a tank, and it is heavy to move around even when empty so dont plan on filling this thing with tools and trying to carry it around with you. I just had it static on my work bench and it works great. Good quality product and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this toolbox. Normally I like to view toolboxes in person because most of them are made so poorly. Looks to be well made and the drawers pull in/out smoothly. I also like how they snap in place when closed and how it came with precut soft liners for each drawer. As others mentioned this toolbox should be stationary--it won't stand up to being dragged around all day. No problem though as I keep this on my workbench.
customer_reviews.author: TwoNiner

customer_reviews.title: Non-skid - well made sturdy steel tool box
customer_reviews.text: This tool box has non-skid material, which keeps the tools from sliding around. It is well made with sturdy steel.
customer_reviews.author: DaleW

customer_reviews.title: Drawers slide open
customer_reviews.text: It's very difficult to close all the drawers and lock everything in -- I am never certain that everything won't come crashing out. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Little Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Awesoem
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought. Bought as a gift for boyfriend. He loves it. Kind of heavy when full but that’s to be expected. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE TOOL BOX!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the box in very short order, Immediately organized all my mechanics tools, and threw out my old plastic box with the removable shelf. Now everything has it's place, finally! It is not huge but having drawers really makes the difference in organization for me. I feel that the build quality is adequate for many years of use. I would not let it slide and slam around in the truck though. And make sure the drawers are closed all the way before slamming the top so as not to damage the locking mechanism. I'll try to give an update in a couple years. For now I am stoked!
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON ADDICT

customer_reviews.title: Great box for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great box for the price. The metal seems a little lighter than I was hoping for, but for the price it is a good box.
customer_reviews.author: James Layman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality metal chest
customer_reviews.text: The 3 drawer metal tool chest is a bit of a hard product to find as most are plastic and hardly comparable. This is, and has been a very well made tool chest with quality locking and easy to access top and pull-out drawers. The drawers are all the same depth and height and are quite adequate for most tools you would want to stuff in them. The tool chest can take a beating, too as I've had it roll around occasionally when taking corners quicker than perhaps I should have.
customer_reviews.author: D. Childress

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son for owns a logging business. He should be quite pleased with this choice
customer_reviews.author: Paula Giles

customer_reviews.title: plastic handle on a HEAVY tool chest?  The handle can't possibly withstand the weight empty, much less with heavy tools
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY! I sent it back because I couldn't imagine the plastic handle would stand up to any extra weight in this already heavy tool chest. If you're looking for a shallow drawer chest that won't be carried then this would be great...
customer_reviews.author: pepperTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great looking box with smooth drawers
customer_reviews.text: Great box for work since I move around the shop sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Not bullet-proof, but if it stays in the shop it will do
customer_reviews.text: For the money this tool chest does what I need it to do. I keep it inside my RC plane trailer where it contains small tools and spare parts. It is not heavy-duty, and the drawer locking mechanism does not engage very cleanly. I keep keep a ratchet strap over it as a safeguard to prevent the drawers from sliding open when the cover is closed.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.F.

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT YOYO CASE.
customer_reviews.text: perfect to hold and protect a good chuck of my YoYo collection. I can fit 42 yo-yos in the drawers and the top part can hold some big offstring YoYos even a big yo. I have 57 yo-yos just In this box.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good tool box
customer_reviews.text: With three drawers and a top section as well, this box gives you plenty of versatility in storing your tools. When filled, it is, as you might expect, heavy but manageable. I usually leave it in place on my workbench and don't pick it up often, but the handle has held up just fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: James Roth

customer_reviews.title: Nice for smaller
customer_reviews.text: Decent tool box but the drawers are a little bit flimsy. Nice for smaller, less heavy items. However, If you want something very heavy duty and rugged this may not be the tool box for you. Also, the drawers lock when the lid is closed which is slightly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Shimer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This is a tool box for our motor home. Just what I wanted for a modest amount of travel tools.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: works great, a few mods and I am loving it! I took off the internal locking mechanism as this is not going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking, get one
customer_reviews.text: I had put off buying a tool box for a while, I am so glad I got one I might get a second. It sits in my workroom and makes all of the tools easy to reach and easy to put away, no more digging or throwing tools in a box. It is not a 5 star product because I would not trust as a travel tool box.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect much at the price, but I was pleasantly surprised. This unit seems well built - everything fits and works as advertised. It even includes rubber drawer liners which is nice. I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toolbox. It is heavy and of great quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toolbox. It is heavy and of great quality. A nice classic look with ample room for a wide array of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Cory A

customer_reviews.title: homak chest
customer_reviews.text: Average to low-average quality upon arrival. The drawers didn't move well and there was already a ding in the lightweight metal side. I could just see that it wasn't going to stand up to time so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: marykm

customer_reviews.title: For my application it is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to place on top of my mechanics 8 drawer tool cabinet. I use it for the small tools and it matches my old Sears cabinet well. I am not sure how this chest would survive banging around in the back of a pickup truck. However for my application it suit the bill very well.
customer_reviews.author: Borge

customer_reviews.title: Solid Metal - Good Small Tools Drawers
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, solid metal construction, good solid drawer locking. Only refinement might involve the handle (sized a little too small across knuckles for me) and the latch-locks for top drawer (once again the latch lift edges are a bit dainty). Overall excellent and I'm sure it will last. Caution... this is a great box for those "normal" sized hand tools and small electric ones only.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to haul tools to the motorcycle track. It has taken a beating and held up reasonably well. The dusty environment pretty much destroyed the drawer slides and the locking clasps are weak. For the price this is a good tool box. But if you need something extremely durable and portable I recommend getting something more suitable for that.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M. Orth

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Price was a little higher than I wanted, but the quality is there. Drawers glide well, come pre-lined and everything is solid metal.
customer_reviews.author: Realistic shopper

customer_reviews.title: HOMAK RD01032101 3-Drawer Tool Box/Chest Red
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. I purchased this as a gift for my husband to store his tools in. We've been happy with the product, and it's durability. I'd definitely recommend this to others looking for a great toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerTop Contributor: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice box
customer_reviews.text: For $64 it's worth the money. The drawers feel pretty solid. It looks nice. It did come with some very small dents on the sides. About the size of a ball point pen. Just filled it up today with tools so i'll post an update if it fails to amuse
customer_reviews.author: mile d murzi

customer_reviews.title: Great portable tool box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Excellent price, especially if Amazon offers it with free Super Saver Shipping. Ball bearing drawers work great. When you close and snap in the drawers with the lid open and then close the top, all drawers are then locked into place as one unit so they don't slide out. Also, besides the drawers it has a fairly nice extra top storage area. Handle seems to be a special extra tuff kind of resin which seems very strong. .As long as it is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: kiteflyervt

customer_reviews.title: Good size and fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! I’ll go bigger when I get more tools , works for now!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: my husband is a carpenter and the smaller tool box he had at work could'nt fit all of his tools. this one is the perfect size for all his tools. there is even room to fit more tools he will soon be buying....most likely from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: lucasfamily

customer_reviews.title: Nice box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good toolbox, however I found it a bit heavy for portable use, but just fine as a stay-at-home unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: NICE COULD BE BETTER
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS GREAT. DRAWERS ARE SMOOTH TO OPEN. COULD HAVE THICKER AND STRONGER SIDES. BUT THEN IT WOULD BE MUCH HEAVIER. WORKS GREAT FOR MY PURPOSES FOR A IN HOME, WELL ORGANIZED TOOL BOX ON THE WORK BENCH. I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND,
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for some extra tool storage on the workbench. It holds my electronic tools for hobby use. I'm keeping it stationary only because it is very heavy with all the tools in it. I was surprised at the ball-bearing drawers because of their sheer quality. It comes with lining and overall is much higher quality than those sold at hardware stores mostly because of the great drawers. Buy this item, it's impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Dodge4L1fe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't use tools often so I don't need to spend much. This is right for the price.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy, strong built tool box, fast shipping, Great customer service, highly recommend and would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Mugleston

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, good quality tool box for Joe Six Packs.
customer_reviews.text: I checked out Lowes and Ace Hardware for toolboxes. This one definitely outpriced any of the toolboxes for all the features you get. I'm a novice home remodeller and it has plenty of space for all my hand tools and misc junk that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy C. Chung

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: I do wonder why this box can't be found at the big box hardware stores. It's a nice box and I only wish I had gotten a three drawer box instead of the two!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Krawczyk

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made, does not hold tools.
customer_reviews.text: drawers are made of extremely thin steel, they bend and do not lock. I got tired of cleaning up all the tools that fell out, and warn all to avoid this product. Very disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: M Bee

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased box as a gift for my son. He loved it, perfect to throw in his truck.Quality of the box was great,drawer liners included.roller bearing slider.Great box for the price.
customer_reviews.author: terrell white

customer_reviews.title: Chinese made
customer_reviews.text: It is made in China, but you can't find any US made in the smaller boxes. This has ball bearing slides and seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T

customer_reviews.title: Very well made toolbox at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of toolboxes over the years and I can truly say this one is the best for the money. Very sturdy and nicely crafted and finished. The plastic handle seems out of character somehow but it's fine. It's a good lookin' box in black too! Quick delivery even on the free shipping deal.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence W. Ludwigsen

customer_reviews.title: Gift for hubby
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. It is sturdy and he was able to organize some of his tools. He can now find them when doing the honey-do list.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to put all his odds and ends- managed to pack a good amount of stuff in there then transferred some main tools from another tool kit to this one!
customer_reviews.author: L. Baldyga

customer_reviews.title: Tool Box
customer_reviews.text: The tool box is what I expected and good value for money. The item arrived ahead of time and suits the purpose I purchased it for. I would recomend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Not what you thought
customer_reviews.text: It is cheaply made but it does work good but the metal is not the best
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good-looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for husband and he loves it! The drawers slide smoothly, are spacious, and the whole unit is high-quality metal, solid fabrication.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great tool box.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and all his tools. Now I do not have to fall over them lying out on the floor! Seems to be well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: No Angel

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Made from thin-gauge steel, but nicely assembled. Drawers open smoothly with a great feel. Although it's fairly nice quality, it doesn't feel very "beatable".
customer_reviews.author: James A Flenner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool box!
customer_reviews.text: I use it in it in my RV. It is just right size to hold the tools that I use the most and fits neatly in the storage bay.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Solid "stay at home" tool box
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tool box. Quite heavy. I kind of wish the drawers would open without the top needing to be up since this will be staying in one spot most of the time. Great color, nice construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mikyo

customer_reviews.title: dynamite box
customer_reviews.text: this box is solid an has ball bearing rollers on draws for the money you cant find a better box
customer_reviews.author: Rose F.

customer_reviews.title: Made to last
customer_reviews.text: It's a law of the universe that tools will multiply to fill the given space. It's true for this toolbox or the large, $500 rolling cabinets. So if you're worried this toolbox will not be big enough, I'm sorry to say that no tool box will ever be big enough. What this toolbox does offer though is sturdy construction of thick metal, quality locking drawers, and a handle I'm not afraid to use. It will hold every essential tool you'll need to carry to jobs on your car or around your house. I'm glad I spent a little more on a nice, quality product that is build to last and has the space I need.
customer_reviews.author: SaidTheGirl

customer_reviews.title: solid built, smooth drawers, beware of the handle!
customer_reviews.text: for this price can't beat the quality, solidly built, very smooth drawers... Beware of the handle though, the plastic handle broke after 15 seconds the first time i loaded up and start carrying it to my car, the whole chest slammed on the ground from a carrying height (2 feet), good thing it's a solid construction, the chest didn't seem to sustain any damage... Get a strap to carry it around (the ratcheting tarp tie-downs work great)
customer_reviews.author: nexum1919

customer_reviews.title: nice box, wish it had side handles
customer_reviews.text: nice box,wish it had side handles,mabey i got too many tools in it.
customer_reviews.author: allen vight

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool box
customer_reviews.text: I like this box because there is plenty of room for my tools and the drawers operate smoothly. I leave it in my shop so don't know how it would hold up when transporting tools. Pads on the bottom of the drawers are also a welcome feature. Also, compared to the tool boxes I've seen in Home Depot and Sears, this one is less expensive and the drawers operate smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Pacanowski

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very solid product - The ball bearings allow for smooth motion of the drawers. My ONLY complaint it the packaging. First item arrived with a good sized dent in the bottom which made the bottom and middle drawer unmoveable. Amazon is as good as it gets in terms of replacement of items damaged during shipping, I had a replacement in my hands the next day. Just be careful, because a good hit from dropping this would likely cause a similar issue.
customer_reviews.author: Xialater

customer_reviews.title: Good drawer tool chest
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tool chest. I could not come even close at this price anywhere that I looked. I transfered my tools into it and the drawers still open on the rollers easily. Thanks for a great price on a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Renea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great constructions, draw glides work great. Gift for my son's birthday and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: R. W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome home tool box; value for $
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Amazon after researching quite a bit for a ~$50 home tool box. Compared Craftsman, Snap-on, Grizzly and Homak; Homak came ahead in terms of quality of construction, features (like Ball Bearing drawers - which is really nice) and of course price. Bought the "Red" version and simply love it. Go ahead and get one - you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: buntu

customer_reviews.title: Great Box, Read Instructions FIRST
customer_reviews.text: First thing I did was try to yank open a drawer...wrong. You need the top open completely for the drawer locking mechanism to release. It doesn't appear that I damaged it by "forcing" it open with one big pull. Other than that, it's a nice high quality tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Wickerman

customer_reviews.title: Tool box
customer_reviews.text: Made well and looks good. It is a bit small for the guy with lots of tools. I ended up buying two. The latch could use some beefing up.
customer_reviews.author: john w delodder

customer_reviews.title: Tools
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this gift and fits quite a lot of his tools in. It is very sturdy and heavy which aparently is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Homak 2 Drawer Tool Box
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these now. I use one for my metric tools and the other for my English tools. Very high quality, and small enough to move and carry.
customer_reviews.author: David S Nycz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for the husband, use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Soto-Mayorga

customer_reviews.title: Could Use Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great begginer box. Not a whole lot of space, but enough to get by. The drawer lock mechanism was flimsy and eventually they didn't stay locked.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Odom II

customer_reviews.title: Tool Box
customer_reviews.text: I am Gal that loves her tools and needed a nice tool box. This was a nice size the drawers pull out nice, but wasnt impressed that the right side latch was broken and bent. I kinda fixed it so it works, but not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Hondacat

customer_reviews.title: Great tool box
customer_reviews.text: This unit is great for keeping my ring and openened spanners in. The sliding draws make it a lot easerer to select what spanner i need for a job as they are layed out neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: latch and handle buckle easily
customer_reviews.text: At first I though this would be a heavy duty tool box but when it arrived, i was a little disappointed at the build quality of the box. I found the handle to be very weak and not a safe way to carry this box once filled with my tools. The two front latch does cannot handle the weigh and will buckle with very little stuff inside. I would consider a different box if you are a mobile person and require frequent moves. If you just need it in the garage then this might work for you. Instead I went with this one from sears which seems more reliable and sturdier. The Craftsman 26 in. Power Latch Tool Box
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift and it fits his needs.
customer_reviews.author: No Name please for feedbacks

customer_reviews.title: Good tool box
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. Stylish black paint finish. Make sure you know the size before purchasing because it feels a little small.
customer_reviews.author: P. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Item delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had with this item is few small size dents on the back of this tool box. There shouldn't be any visible dents in a brand new item if packaged and cared for properly.
customer_reviews.author: Pejman Jabbari

customer_reviews.title: Not bad - for "Made in China"
customer_reviews.text: To be perfectly honest, this is a good tool box for the home user that just needs drawers to organize. If you plan to transport the box on a regular basis, you should consider something more durable. The annoying thing is that he drawers have no dividers. Pros: Nice finish, ball bearing slides, good size. Cons: Made in China, flimsy handle, will not handle a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mishka

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool box
customer_reviews.text: Customer services is good, and the product is what it was represented to be. No problem with shipping. Would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: William Rode

product_meta.title: Homak 20-Inch 3-Drawer Ball-Bearing Toolbox/Chest, Red, RD01032101
product_meta.description:
Color:Red| Size:3-DrawerThe 20" 3 drawer steel tool box is manufactured using the highest grade of raw materials available for strength and durability. Each drawer is includes slip proof mats and ball bearing glides. The drawers also Lock when lid is Closed for easy mobility. This toolbox is secured by a double latch system and also includes a top storage area.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Homak Manufacturing was founded in 1947 in Chicago by Sigmund H. Danziger. The name "Homak" was coined after a sign that Sigmund saw on a hat store. Originally a manufacturer of steel kitchen cabinets, Homak Expanded its product offerings in the 1960s to included a separate line of hardware products such as toolboxes, tool cabinets, and other accessories. Homak's hardware line remained strong and was accepted in many major retail businesses of its time. Following Sigmund's death in 1979, his wife, Gertrude, ran the company for 25 years. Under Gertrude's guidance, Homak extended its product line with automotive, hospital, and sporting goods. In January of 2005 Homak was acquired by JVA and moved its office to western Pennsylvania. Its facility now resides in the Wampum Underground Commerce Center. Today, Homak emphasizes tool storage and gun cabinet security. The full product line consists of hand-carry toolboxes, tool bags, parts organizers, tool storage cabinets, workbenches, garage furniture, safety cabinets, spill containment systems, P.B & E. products, steel lockers, gun cabinets, fire-resistant safes, ammo storage boxes and accessories. Each item is manufactured to exceed customer's expectations, and to provide strength and dependability to the customer.
feature_bullets: Each drawer is equipement with slip proof mats and ball bearing glides
All drawers Lock when lid is closed for easy mobility with out drawers opening and spilling stored items
Double latch system with pad lock for security
